body:
Hi Nick,

From your screenshot I can see that you are having an issue with a vertical PVsurface (tilt angle equals 90 degrees). This was a [bug and it has been fixed](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/xn/detail/2985220:Comment:1482064). To benefit from this fix, your Ladybug_ladybug component must be equal or newer than 11th of March 2016. (Ladybug version 0.0.62). Download the [newest one from here](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/blob/master/userObjects/Ladybug_Ladybug.ghuser).

As for the issue you're having with the final output, would you be so kind to attach both your .gh and .3dm files please? Thank you.
